FileFormat.FormatDescription: Adobe FrameMaker Interchange Format is an alternative representation of an Adobe FrameMaker document as a text file, using ASCII statements to convey its contents, graphics and formatting. It allows FrameMaker and other applications, or different versions of FrameMaker, to exchange information.
FileFormat.ProvenanceName: Digital Preservation Department / The National Archives
FileFormat.ProvenanceDescription: 04/2024 (v.118): Description and links added. Archives nationales (French National Archives).

InternalSignature.SignatureNote: MIFFile statement followed by a comment
